get.description: Returns all matching cost accounting entries.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-System
parameters.description: Identifying the system calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-User
parameters.description: Identifying the user calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Flow-ID
parameters.description: Optional technical Id (GUID) for call identification.

parameters.name: X-Client-Type
parameters.description: Optional client type calling the service.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of entries  to skip  for pagination.

parameters.name: changesSinceDateTime
parameters.description: Get all entries since the specified date time.

parameters.name: changesSinceChangeId
parameters.description: Get all entries since the specified change id.

parameters.name: companyNo
parameters.description: Get the entries of the specified company number.

parameters.name: entryId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the entry.

parameters.name: entryNo
parameters.description: Entry number of the cost accounting entry. May be used together with the company number.

parameters.name: externalEntryId
parameters.description: External entry id of the cost accounting entry.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of entries to return.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-System
parameters.description: Identifying the system calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-User
parameters.description: Identifying the user calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Flow-ID

parameters.name: X-Client-Type
parameters.description: Optional client type calling the service.

put.summary: Updates an existing presence time if internal or external Id match. Creates a presence time if neither internal or external Id is provided or no matching record could be found.

parameters.name: X-Client-Type

delete.summary: Deletes a presence time either by presenceTimeId"/> or origin and originId.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-User

parameters.description: Optional client type calling the service.

parameters.name: presenceTimeId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the presence time to delete.

parameters.name: origin
parameters.description: The system of origin of the presence time to delete. Used together with the originId.

parameters.name: originId
parameters.description: Id in the system of origin of the presence time to delete. Used together with the origin.

put.summary: Updates an existing absence if internal or external Id match. Creates an absence if neither internal or external Id is provided or no matching record could be found.
put.description: Updates an existing absence if internal or external Id match. Creates an absence if neither internal or external Id is provided or no matching record could be found.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-System
parameters.description: Identifying the system calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-User
parameters.description: Identifying the user calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Flow-ID
parameters.description: Optional technical Id (GUID) for call identification.

parameters.name: X-Client-Type

requestBody.description: A list of absences to update or create.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-System
parameters.description: Identifying the system calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-User
parameters.description: Identifying the user calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Flow-ID
parameters.description: Optional technical Id (GUID) for call identification.

parameters.name: X-Client-Type
parameters.description: Optional client type calling the service.

parameters.name: absenceId
parameters.description: Identifies the absence.

parameters.name: origin
parameters.description: The system of origin.

parameters.name: originId
parameters.description: Id in the system of origin.

modifyUser.description: User who last modified the entry.

modifyDate.description: Date the entry was last modified.

externalEntryId.description: Id of the entry in the external system.

entryNo.description: Identifier of entry in combination with the CompanyNo. Not unique.

costCenterNo.description: Cost center identifier. Either costCenterNo, costUnitNo or orderNo may be used at once.

costUnitNo.description: Cost unit identifier. Either costCenterNo, costUnitNo or orderNo may be used at once.

orderNo.description: Order no identifier. Either costCenterNo, costUnitNo or orderNo may be used at once.

salesChannel.description: Identifies the sales channel. May be used together with costCenterNo, CostUnitNo or orderNo.

budgetOrActual.description: B => Budget / I => Actual / P => Plan / K => Shortterm income statement

amountBSC.description: Amount of the entry in balance sheet currency.

quantity.description: Quantity in the unit defined on the cost type.

isMarkedForDeletion.description: Is the entry going to be deleted in the next cost accounting processing?

isProcessed.description: Is the entry processed and will therefore be shown in reports?

generated.description: Defines the type of system generated entries. E => Debit bookings for combined cc & cu entries / F => Fix cost entries / K => Short term income statement / V => Cost allocation / Z => Additional entries / B => Credit bookings for allocations / T => Debit bookings for allocations

CostAccountingEntry.description: Represents a entry in the cost accounting.

active.description: Is this entry active or not?

modifyUser.description: User who last modified the entry.

modifyDate.description: Date the entry was last modified.

externalArticleId.description: Id of the article in the external system.

articleNo.description: Article number for identification by the users.

conversionFactorStockUnitPriceUnit.description: The conversion factor to convert StockUnit to PriceUnit e.g. 1 (stockUnitCode).

conversionFactorPriceUnitStockUnit.description: The conversion factor to convert PriceUnit to StockUnit e.g. 12 (priceUnitCode).

stockManagement.description: Is the stock level managed on a quantity basis?

inventoryManagement.description: Is the stock level managed on an inventory basis?

articleGroupId.description: Unique identifier of the article group.

countryOfOrigin.description: ISO code of the country of origin.

description.description: Full description in the given language.

shortDescription.description: Short description in the given language.

MaterialManagementArticleLocalization.description: Represents a (material management) article localization entry.

priceId.description: Internal identifier of the article price.

modifyUser.description: User who last modified the entry.

modifyDate.description: Date the entry was last modified.

externalPriceId.description: Indentificaion of the article price in the external system.

priceTypeCode.description: C4074 - Type of price (standard, avarage, last purchase price).

validFrom.description: Date from which the price entry is valid.

price.description: Price per price Unit in balance sheet currency.

taxSystem.description: Country of tax system as ISO code.

vatTypeCode.description: C83 - Tax type (normal rate, reduced rate,...).

MaterialManagementArticleVat.description: Represents a (material management) article vat entry.

modifyUser.description: User who last modified the entry.

modifyDate.description: Date the entry was last modified.

sortNo.description: Position within the attribute value set.

attributeValueSetId.description: Internal identification of attribute value set.

modifyUser.description: User who last modified the entry.

modifyDate.description: Date the entry was last modified.

presenceTimeId.description: Unique identifier of the presence time dataset.

companyNo.description: The company number identifies the customer via the corresponding number in the mandate system.

personnelNo.description: Id of the "Leistungsträger" in the external system.

hours.description: Hours the service provider was present.

timeFrom.description: Time the service provider started work.

timeUntil.description: Time the service provider ended work.

isLocked.description: The presence time record is locked for all but the origin system.

originId.description: Id in the system of origin.

PresenceTime.description: The DTO for a presence time.

modifyUser.description: User who last modified the entry.

modifyDate.description: Date the entry was last modified.

sortNo.description: Position within the attribute value set.

attributeValueSetId.description: Internal identification of attribute value set.

modifyUser.description: User who last modified the entry.

modifyDate.description: Date the entry was last modified.

modifyUser.description: User who last modified the entry.

modifyDate.description: Last modification date of the entry.

purchaseOrderNo.description: Purchase order number of the entry.

externalPurchseOrderId.description: External id of the entry - may be used instead of the technical identification.

supplierId.description: Id of the supplier of the entry.

purchaseOrderTypeCode.description: C2462 - How was the order placed? Post, eMail,...

purchaseOrderStateCode.description: C2452 - State of the order e.g. recorded, placed, partially delivered,...

exchangeRate.description: Exchange rate used for purchase when not in own currency.

isPurchaseOrderSent.description: Flag if the purchase order was been sent.

purchaseOrderSendDate.description: Date the purchase order was sent.

deliveryDateRequested.description: Requested delivery date, if no confirmation, this is written to the delivery date.

deliveryDate.description: Confirmed delivery date. Equals requested delivery date if not confirmed.

priceDate.description: Date of the price information the purchase is based on.

orderConfirmationDateRequested.description: Date the supplier should confirm the order.

orderConfirmationNo.description: Order confirmation no from the supplier.

shippingAddressCode.description: C2464 - Where is the purchase delivered? (24640001 - pickup address, 24640002 - shipping address)

shippingBusinessPartnerAddressId.description: Unique identifier of the shipping business partner address (Required for shippings).

pickupBusinessPartnerAddressId.description: Unique identifier of the pickup business partner address (Required for pickups).

pickupEmployeeBusinessPartnerId.description: Unique identifier of the contact person at the pickup address.

shippingTypeCode.description: C2463 - How is the purchase shipped? Pick up, lorry, post,...

incoTermsCode.description: C2467 - Incoterms define the responsibilities of exporters and importers in the arrangement of shipments and the transfer of liability involved at various stages of the transaction.

destinationDeliveryDateRequested.description: Requested destination delivery date, e.g. date of transfer of responsibility.

destinationDeliveryDate.description: Destination delivery date, e.g. date of transfer of responsibility.

ordererBusinessPartnerAddressId.description: Unique identifier of the business partner address of the orderer.

supplierBusinessPartnerAddressId.description: Unique identifier of the supplier business partner address.

supplierEmployeeBusinessPartnerId.description: Unique identifier of the contact person at the supplier.

supplierNotes.example: Every year in early summer, the supplier runs a promotion on all metal goods. Internal task recorded in the info centre so that we can place a bulk order for screws and fasteners.

internalRemarks.example: Promised delivery dates are never met.

externalRemarks.description: Remarks added to the supplier order.
externalRemarks.example: Please let us know the delivery dates in more detail.

openingText.example: You have received the following order. Please check the items and confirm the delivery by means of an order confirmation.

footerText.description: Final remarks concerning the order put in the footer of the order.
footerText.example: Please inform us of any price changes in writing at the e-mail address purchase@memor.ch. Thank you very much.

reference.description: Reference that helps reidentify the purchase.

originOrderNo.description: Order number of the associated sales or production order.

automaticCompletion.description: Is the purchase order automatically completed once it has been fully delivered and invoiced?

positionId.description: Unique id of the order position.

positionNr.description: Item number. Format and conditions via company settings.

modifyUser.description: User who last modified the entry.

modifyDate.description: Date the entry was last modified

positionTypeCode.description: C2455 - Type of the position 1: article 2: amount 3: text.

priceTypeCode.description: C2458 - Pricetype 1: Normal price 2: Special offer price.

inputTaxCode.description: C23 - Type of applied tax (vat, input tax).

storageId.description: Identifier of the storage - Overrides values in header.

storageAreaId.description: Identifier of the storage location - Overrides values in header.

shippingTypeCode.description: C2463 - How is the purchase delivered? Pick up, lorry, post,...  - Overrides values in header

priceOriginCode.description: C2459 - Origin of the price information 1: Set manually 2: Supplier article price 3: Supplier article scale price 4: Current materials purchase price.

assetNo.description: Identifier of the asset the order is placed for.

costCenterNo.description: Cost center responsible for the order.

costUnitNo.description: Cost unit responsible for the order.

orderNo.description: Identifier of the accounting order for posting expense.

deliveryDateRequested.description: Requested delivery date, if no confirmation, this is written to the delivery date. - Overrides value from the header.

deliveryDate.description: Confirmed delivery date. Equals requested delivery date if not confirmed. - Overrides value from the header.

destinationDeliveryDateRequested.description: Requested destination delivery date, e.g. date of transfer of responsibility. - Overrides value from the header.

destinationDeliveryDate.description: Destination delivery date, e.g. date of transfer of responsibility. - Overrides value from the header.

countryOfOrigin.description: ISO code of country of origin.

orderConfirmationDate.description: Date the order was confirmed. - Overrides value from the header.

orderConfirmationNo.description: Order confirmation no from the supplier. - Overrides value from the header.

orderConfirmationDateRequested.description: Date the supplier should confirm the order. - Overrides value from the header.

isFullyCharged.description: Indicates whether the purchase position has been fully charged or whether it is still partially open.

netAmount.description: Net amount (gross - tax) of the order position.

taxAmount.description: Amount of taxes for the order position.

isPrinted.description: Determines whether an item is printed on the order document or not.

active.description: Is this entry active or not?

modifyUser.description: User who last modified the entry.

modifyDate.description: Date the entry was last modified.

businessPartnerAddressId.description: Business partner address id of the entry.

externalSupplierId.description: External id of the entry - may be used instead of the technical identification.

supplierRatingCode.description: C2466 - User code to set the rating of the supplier.

ourCustomerNo.description: Our customer identification with the supplier.

paymentTermsCode.description: C27 - Payment terms with the supplier.

printoutCopyQuantity.description: Quantity of the purchase order printout copies.

printPrices.description: Are the purchase prices shown on the purchase order document?

orderChannelCode.description: C2462 - Order channel, how to order from this supplier e.g. by post,by email, by telephone, by fax, by internet.

confirmationPeriod.description: Number of days until an order confirmation is expected.

reminderConfirmationPeriod.description: Number of days until a reminder is generated for order confirmation - after confirmation period.

reminderDeliveryPeriod.description: Number of days until a reminder is generated for a missed delivery.

landedCostsInPercentage.description: Landed costs are additional charges or costs incurred for the purchase order.

vatCode.description: Default input tax applied for the suppliers invoices.

freightTypeCode.description: C2463 - Freight type e.g. lorry, post, truck, courier, collection etc.

incoTermsCode.description: C2467 - Incoterms define the responsibilities of exporters and importers in the arrangement of shipments and the transfer of liability involved at various stages of the transaction.

deliveryDuration.description: Delivery time for order proposal calculations and warning in the order programme (e.g. 5 days delivery time no longer works for tomorrow) Specification in whole days.

deliveryDays.description: Delivery days from dropdown box (multiselect) for delivery date proposal, default Monday - Friday checked. Bitmap, starting with Monday (1st digit) 0=not selected, 1=selected.

invoiceBusinessPartnerAddressId.description: Business partner address id for invoicing.

pickupBusinessPartnerAddressId.description: Business partner address id for pickup.

automaticCompletion.description: Default for the automatic completion of purchase orders with this supplier

serviceProviderDayId.description: Identification of the service provider day.

personnelNo.description: Id of the person/(human) service provider in the external system.

timePeriodCode.description:
C575 - Predefined time periods

5750020 - Entire day

5750040 - Morning

5750060 - Afternoon.

absenceApplicationId.description: Identifies the application for this absence.

isLocked.description: This absence is locked for changes in performis UI.

originId.description: Id in the system of origin.

active.description: Is this entry active or not?

companyNo.description: The company number identifies the customer via the corresponding number in the mandate system.

shortDescription.description: Short identifier/abbreviation/acronym of the service provider.

description.description: Full description / Name of the service provider.

externalId.description: Identification in an external system e.g. the card ID from a locking system can be included here. It is not the identification from the system of origin.

function.description: Function, position or title of the service provider.

serviceProviderTypeCode.description:
C286 - Type of the service provider

1 - Mitarbeiter - Employees

2 - Maschinen   - Machines

3 - Kleingeräte - Small devices

5 - Allgemein   - Universal.

department.description: Department the service provider is assigned to.

defaultServiceTypeId.description: Default service type id of the service provider .

originId.description: Id in the system of origin.

serviceRecordDate.description: Day on which the service was provided.

serviceProviderDayId.description: Identification of the service provider day.

period.description: Accounting period of the entry. Format YYYYMM (e.g. 202401).

quantity.description: The amount of work performed. The unit depends on the type of service.

serviceRecordStatusCode.description:
C291 - State of the service entry

2910010 - Provisional              - Provisorisch

2910020 - Recorded                 - Erfasst

2910025 - Not ready for billing    - Nicht verrechnungsbereit

2910030 - Ready for billing        - Verrechnungsbereit

2910040 - Billed                   - Verrechnet

2910045 - No billing               - Keine Verrechnung.

isLocked.description: The service record is locked for changes in performis UI.

machineServiceProviderDayId.description: For machine service records only. Identification of the service provider day of the machine operator (person).

serviceRecordGuid.description: Globally Unique Identifier of the service record. Is set automatically if not specified.

noCaccPosting.description: Service record will not be posted to cost accounting.

originId.description: Id in the system of origin.

originStatusCode.description:
C577 - Status of the origin

5770100 - not approved       - nicht freigegeben

5770200 - partially approved - teilweise freigegeben

5770500 - approved           - freigegeben.
